----
const response = await client.search({
  index: "products",
  aggs: {
    genres_and_products: {
      multi_terms: {
        terms: [
          {
            field: "genre",
          },
          {
            field: "product",
          },
        ],
        order: {
          total_quantity: "desc",
        },
      },
      aggs: {
        total_quantity: {
          sum: {
            field: "quantity",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
----
